text: "I Lay My Love on You" is a 2001 song by Irish group Westlife and is the fourth single from their second studio album Coast to Coast. It went to number 24 in New Zealand, number 29 in Australia, number 23 in Italy and Austria, number 12 in the Netherlands, number 20 in Spain, number 10 in Sweden, number 14 in Poland, number 50 in Germany and was not released in Ireland and the United Kingdom. ==Track listings== CD1 # "I Lay My Love on You" (Single Remix) – 3:29 # "Dreams Come True" – 3:07 * CD1 is cased within a digipak and comes with four limited edition photocards. CD2 # "I Lay My Love on You" (Single Remix) – 3:29 # "Dreams Come True" – 3:07 # "My Love" – 3:52 # "Nothing Is Impossible" – 3:15 ==References== Category:2001 songs Category:Westlife songs
title: I Lay My Love on You
